content: This is a great read Daniel, it takes me back to a talk that Denise Jacobs gave “Everyone is Creative”. I think that as designers we have fought so hard to be included in business decisions that we now try to exclude “non-designer roles” from our creative process. A huge part of my job as the UX designer for a startup is working hand in hand with our engineering, customer service and sales teams, both taking and giving feedback into the design process.
